block.copycats.copycat_beam.tooltip.beha: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_beam.tooltip.summ: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative beam.

block.copycats.copycat_board.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
